data.title: West Ham Hospitality
data.meta_description: London Stadium is the place to be to see the Hammers in Premier League action. And West Ham hospitality packages are available!
data.text:
WEST HAM HOSPITALITY - PREMIUM OPTIONS

Watch West Ham in Premier League action in style at Club London. An exclusive area of the stadium with its own entrance Club London is home to a range of premium experiences to accommodate a range of budgets.

The Academy Bar is the perfect place to enjoy an informal build up to the match with fellow Hammers fans before heading out to your padded seats overlooking the halfway line. Or why not try the Great Briton Lounge (full package details below) with its heralded sit-down pre-match food and visit from Hammers legends.

Then there's the Royal East Lounge, with its floor to ceiling glass aspect offering some of the finest views of the pitch, while the Arnold Hills experience is perfect for fans of fine dining. Email westham@sportonspec.co.uk to find out more.

2024/2025 SEASON PREVIEW

Built for the London 2012 and set in the heart of Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park London Stadium is an iconic sporting venue.

David Moyes' reign as West Ham manager ended in May. He left a fine legacy including one of the most memorable night's in the club's history. A 2-1 win over Fiorentina in the final of the European Conference League (in May 2022) bringing the first major silverware in 43 years back to east London and ensuring Europa League football this season.

Julen Lopetegui has replaced Moyes and he inherits a young and exciting Hammers squad including club record signing Lucas Paquet√° and Edson Alvarez and James Ward-Prowse.

Can Lopetegui's side write another famous chapter in the West Ham history books this season? All will be revealed at London Stadium over the next nine months. Read on for how you can experience the action in style!

WEST HAM HOSPITALITY - GREAT BRITON LOUNGE

The Great Briton Lounge is ideal for fans seeking a relaxed premium experience. Located within Club London in the West Stand the package is similar to the Academy Bar, save that the GBL lounge is more spacious and the match seats are closer to the pitch.

Package info as follows:-

Premium padded seat in the West Stand upper tier overlooking the halfway line in Blocks 207-209 (see seat plan adjacent/below).

Matchday programme on arrival and team sheet provided

Half-time drink (wine, beer + soft drinks)

Option to upgrade package to include a sit-down meal

Fast-track entry via dedicated Club London VIP entrance

Club London opening time: 2.5 hours before kick-off

Club London closing time: 1 hour after the final whistle

Access to the Great Briton Lounge (take a virtual tour here)

Food and additional drinks available to purchase at the bar in the lounge

Hammers legends visit the lounge

Children, families and group bookings welcome

Dress code relaxed. No opposition shirts to be worn.

E-tickets

BOOK NOW

West Ham hospitality packages are on sale for all home matches at London Stadium this season!

Complete the short form below OR email westham@sportonspec.co.uk OR call +44 (0)7931 169180 with the game/s you are interested in for *package/price information.

* Official packages only. SportonSpec works only with clubs and/or their authorised resellers.
